definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The next day, she goes to work and proudly displays it.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，她上班的時候驕傲地炫耀着她的新保溫瓶。

sentences.english: There is a vacuum flask on the damask table - cloth.
sentences.chinese: 織花桌布上放着一個保溫瓶。

sentences.english: Tea always tastes horrid out of Thermos flasks.
sentences.chinese: 從保溫瓶裏倒出來的茶總是很難喝。

sentences.english: Charging heating thermo-flask, flask cover, bag and lunch box.
sentences.chinese: 充電加熱保溫瓶，瓶套，包和飯盒。

sentences.english: The hazard of waste water from silvering blanks of vacuum bottles as well as its sources were described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了保溫瓶膽鍍銀廢水的來源及其危害。

sentences.english: Thermos flask the size of the division is based on what criteria?
sentences.chinese: 保溫瓶這個師的大小是根據何種標準？

sentences.english: But don’t replace your water thermos with coffee.
sentences.chinese: 但也不要輕易就用咖啡取代你保溫瓶裏的水。

sentences.english: To the store and bought the thermos flask , thermos flask how good or bad check?
sentences.chinese: 到商店買的熱水瓶，保溫瓶好壞檢查？

sentences.english: And little daughter weeks home not carefully again to give knocked over the thermos.
sentences.chinese: 而周家的小女兒又不小心將保溫瓶給打翻了。

sentences.english: Dale, however, happily pulled out a thermos and began sipping coffee.
sentences.chinese: 而Dale卻高高興興地拿出一個保溫瓶開始喝咖啡。

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
